vein 0.8.4

Construction function for class "EmissionFactors"

EmissionFactors.Rd

EmissionFactors returns a tranformed object with class "EmissionFactors" and units g/km.

EmissionFactors(x, ...)

# S3 method for EmissionFactors
print(x, ...)

# S3 method for EmissionFactors
summary(object, ...)

# S3 method for EmissionFactors
plot(x, ...)

Arguments

x

Object with class "data.frame", "matrix" or "numeric"
...

ignored
object

Object with class "EmissionFactors"

Value

Objects of class "EmissionFactors" or "units"

Examples

{
data(fe2015)
names(fe2015)
class(fe2015)
df <- fe2015[fe2015$Pollutant=="CO", c(ncol(fe2015)-1,ncol(fe2015))]
ef1 <- EmissionFactors(df)
class(ef1)
summary(ef1)
plot(ef1)
print(ef1)
}
